Verses: 1 manidharukkulle Vazhakkundaai, Avargal Niyaayam Visaarikkappata Niyaayasthalaththile Vandhaal, Niyaayaadhibadhigal Needhimaanai Needhimaan Endrum Kutravaaliyaik Kutravaali Endrum Theerkkakkadavargal.
2 kutravaali Adigalukkup Paaththiravaanaanaal, Niyaayaadhibadhi Avanaik Keezhekidakkappanni, Avan Kutraththirkuththakkadhaaith Thanakku Munbaakak Kanakkinbadi Avanai Adippikkakkadavan.
3 avanai Naarpadhu Adivaraikkum Adikkalaam; Avanai Adhilum Adhigamaai Adikkiradhinaal Un Sagodharan Un Kangalukku Munbaaga Neesanaaith Thondruvaan; Aadhalaal Avanai Adhigamaai Adikkavendaam.

5 sagodharar Ondraaik Kudiyirukkumbodhu, Avargalil Oruvan Puththira Sandhaanamillaamal Mariththaal, Mariththavanudaiya Manaivi Puraththilirukkira Anniyanukku Manaiviyaagak Koodaadhu; Avaludaiya Purushanin Sagodharan Avalaith Thanakku Manaiviyaagak Kondu, Avalidaththil Serndhu, Purushanudaiya Sagodharan Seyyavendiya Kadamaiyaich Seyyakkadavan.
6 mariththa Sagodharanudaiya Per Isravelil Atruppogaadhabadikku, Avanperai Aval Perum Thalaippillaikkuth Tharikkavendum.

7 avan Than Sagodharanudaiya Manaiviyai Vivaagampanna Manadhillaadhirundhaal, Avan Sagodharanudaiya Manaivi Vaasalil Koodiya Moopparidaththukkuppoi: En Purushanudaiya Sagodharan Than Sagodharanudaiya Perai Isravelil Nilaikkappannamaatten Engiraan; Purushanudaiya Sagodharan Seyyavendiya Kadamaiyaich Seyya Avan Manadhillaadhirukkiraan Endru Solvaalaaga.
8 appozhudhu Andhap Pattanaththu Mooppar Avanai Azhaippiththu Avanodepesiyum, Avan Avalai Vivaagampannikkolla Enakkuch Sammadhamillai Endru Pidivaadhamaaich Sonnaal,

9 avan Sagodharanudaiya Manaivi Moopparin Kangalukku Munpaaga Avanidaththil Vandhu, Avan Kaalilirukkira Paadharatchaiyaik Kazhatri, Avan Mugaththile Thuppi, Than Sagodharan Veettaik Kattaadhavanukku Ippadiye Seyyappadavendum Endru Sollakkadaval.
10 isravelil Appadippattavan Veedu, Paadharatchai Kazhatrippodappattavan Veedu Ennappadum.

11 purushar Oruvarodoruvar Sandaipannik Kondirukkaiyil, Oruvanudaiya Manaivi Than Purushanai Adikkiravan Kaikku Avanaith Thappuvikkumbadi Vandhu, Than Kaiyai Neetti, Adikkiravan Maanaththaip Pidiththadhundaanaal,
12 avaludaiya Kaiyaith Tharikkakkadavaai; Un Kan Avalukku Irangavendaam.
13 un Paiyile Peridhum Siridhumaana Palavidha Niraikarkalai Vaiththirukkavendaam.
14 un Veettil Peridhum Siridhumaana Palavidha Padigalaiyum Vaiththirukkavendaam.
15 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththil Un Naatkal Neediththirukkumbadi, Kuraiyatra Sumuththiraiyaana Niraigallum, Kuraiyatra Sumuththiraiyaana Padiyum Unnidaththilirukkavendum.
16 ivaimudhalaana Aniyaayaththaich Seygiravan Evanum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavan.
17 egipthilirundhu Purappattu Varugira Vazhiyile, Amalekku Dhevanukkup Bayappadaamal Unakku Edhiraaga Vandhu,
18 nee Ilaiththu Vidaaiththirukkaiyil, Pinvarugira Un Paalayaththilulla Balaveenaraiyellaam Vettinaan Enbadhai Ninaiththiru.

19 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nee Sudhandhariththukkolla Unakkuk Kodukkumdhesaththin Sutruppuraththaaraagiya Unnudaiya Saththurukkalaiyellaam Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Vilakki, Unnai Ilaippaarappannumbodhu, Nee Amalekkin Perai Vaanaththinkeezh Iraadhabadikku Azhiyappannakkadavaai; Idhai Marakkavendaam.
